TopicTitle: Tier 0 (no tech) MÃƒÂ¼n landing and returning.

Articles.Content:
Tier 0 (no tech) spacecraft to MÃƒÂ¼n

This is a simple and reliable design to reach the MÃƒÂ¼n and come back to Kerbin in the career mode without any technology.

Consists in 5 layers of SRB using the little trick to decouple them by overheating. The three extra command modules are to provide more control and stability.

As there are no fuel lines, you must redistribute the fuel few times during the flight. The outer fuel tanks are used landing legs too.

Also, no ladders are present, so you have to use the EVA thrusters to come back to the ship.

My intention was to use this in the first fly of the career mode and get as much points as possible, as you can see I got 302, but using this design (with only a 6th layer of SRB) I reached 937 points traveling to the MÃƒÂ¼n, landing on Minmus, leaving Kerbin system and returning home with about 200 m/s remaining.
Wow,you beat Scott Manley n this, well done!
Way to go zapy. Excellent bit of Kerballing.
Sweet mother of jeebus. Give this man a cookie. (+1 rep)
